EmailTemplate.name: TriCON 2012.Registration is Open
EmailTemplate.subject: TriCON - Registration is now open
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Registration is Open TriTech's Annual User Conference l September 26 - 28, 2012 Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Client}},
We hope that you will make plans to attend TriCON: TriTech's Annual User Conference <http://www.tritech.com/tricon> in San Diego, California.
We are planning an exciting conference focused on "Training for Today. Preparing for Tomorrow." TriCON 2012 will provide you the opportunity to:
- Hear the future vision of the public safety industry and TriTech's direction - Discover our latest product advancements - Receive product training to learn new techniques and enhance current skills - Network with peers to gain insights across the Law, Fire and EMS markets - Build new partnership alliances with key vendors in the expanded exhibit hall - Discuss your agency's needs through face-to-face access to the TriTech team
Don't miss out. Be part of this AMAZING event developed with one goal - customer success now and into the future. Conference Details
Dates:
Wednesday, September 26 - Friday, September 28
Location:
Hilton San Diego Bayfront
San Diego, CA 92101
www.hiltonsandiegobayfront.com <http://www.hiltonsandiegobayfront.com>
Registration:
$695 (Early bird registration)
Additional discounts available to first time attendees and groups of four (4) or more attendees from the same organization.
<http://www.cvent.com/d/8cqly7/4W>
